workflow.name: Reconcile bank transactions and generate reports with GPT-4 and Gmail
workflow.description:
## How It Works
This workflow automates end-to-end financial transaction processing for finance teams managing high-volume bank data. It eliminates manual reconciliation by intelligently classifying transactions, detecting anomalies, and generating executive summaries. The system pulls transaction data from Fable Bank, routes it through multiple AI models (OpenAI GPT-4, NVIDIA NIM) for classification and analysis, reconciles accounts, and distributes formatted reports via email. Finance managers and accounting teams benefit from reduced processing time, improved accuracy, and real-time anomaly detection. The workflow handles transaction categorization, reconciliation schema generation, account matching, journal entry creation, and comprehensive reporting‚Äîtransforming hours of manual work into minutes of automated processing with AI-enhanced accuracy.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Fable Bank API credentials for transaction data access 
2. Add OpenAI API key for GPT-4 classification and reconciliation models 
3. Set up NVIDIA NIM credentials for anomaly detection services 
4. Connect Google Sheets for reconciliation schema storage 
5. Configure Gmail account for automated report distribution  

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API account with GPT-4 access

## Use Cases
Monthly financial close automation, daily transaction monitoring for fraud detection

## Customization
Replace Fable Bank with your banking API

## Benefits
Reduces reconciliation time by 90%, eliminates manual data entry errors

workflow.name: AI-Powered Financial Transaction Reconciliation & Reporting System

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert accounting transaction classifier.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze each transaction from the provided financial data
2. Classify transactions into appropriate accounting categories (e.g., Revenue, Expense, Asset, Liability, Equity)
3. Assign proper account codes based on the chart of accounts
4. Identify transaction types (e.g., sales, purchases, payroll, utilities)
5. Flag any unusual or suspicious transactions for review

Return structured data with transaction ID, classification, account code, category, and any flags.

You are an expert account reconciliation specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Compare bank transactions with accounting system records
2. Match corresponding entries between both systems
3. Identify discrepancies, missing entries, or duplicates
4. Calculate reconciliation differences
5. Determine the cause of any variances
6. Suggest corrective actions for unmatched items

Return structured reconciliation results with matched items, unmatched items, discrepancies, and recommended actions.

You are an expert accounting journal entry specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Create proper double-entry journal entries for all transactions
2. Ensure debits equal credits for each entry
3. Use correct account codes from the chart of accounts
4. Include proper descriptions and references
5. Apply appropriate posting dates
6. Follow GAAP or IFRS accounting standards

Return structured journal entries with entry number, date, account codes, descriptions, debit amounts, credit amounts, and references.

You are an expert accounting error detection specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Review all journal entries for mathematical accuracy
2. Verify debits equal credits
3. Check for duplicate entries
4. Identify posting to incorrect accounts
5. Detect unusual amounts or patterns
6. Flag entries that violate accounting principles
7. Assess severity of each error (Critical, High, Medium, Low)

Return structured error reports with error type, description, affected entries, severity level, and recommended corrections.

You are an expert financial statement preparation specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Generate a complete Balance Sheet with Assets, Liabilities, and Equity
2. Create an Income Statement with Revenue and Expenses
3. Prepare a Cash Flow Statement with Operating, Investing, and Financing activities
4. Calculate key financial ratios and metrics
5. Ensure all statements balance and reconcile
6. Format statements according to accounting standards

Return structured financial statements with all line items, subtotals, totals, and financial ratios.

You are an expert tax reporting specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Calculate taxable income from financial statements
2. Identify deductible expenses and allowable deductions
3. Compute tax liabilities (income tax, sales tax, payroll tax)
4. Prepare tax schedules and supporting documentation
5. Ensure compliance with current tax regulations
6. Identify tax planning opportunities
7. Flag items requiring tax agent review

Return structured tax reports with taxable income, deductions, tax calculations, schedules, and items for tax agent review.

You are an expert tax communication specialist.

Your task is to:
1. Review the tax report and identify items requiring tax agent consultation
2. Compose a professional email to the tax agent
3. Summarize key tax findings and questions
4. Attach relevant tax schedules and documentation references
5. Request specific guidance on complex tax matters
6. Set appropriate follow-up expectations

Use the Gmail Tool to send the email to the tax agent with a clear subject line and comprehensive summary.

parameters.subject: =Autonomous Accounting System - Daily Report - {{ $now.toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd') }}

parameters.content:
## Prerequisites
OpenAI API account with GPT-4 access
## Use Cases
Monthly financial close automation, daily transaction monitoring for fraud detection
### Customization
Replace Fable Bank with your banking API
### Benefits
Reduces reconciliation time by 90%, eliminates manual data entry errors

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Fable Bank API credentials for transaction data access 
2. Add OpenAI API key for GPT-4 classification and reconciliation models 
3. Set up NVIDIA NIM credentials for anomaly detection services 
4. Connect Google Sheets for reconciliation schema storage 
5. Configure Gmail account for automated report distribution

## How It Works
This workflow automates end-to-end financial transaction processing for finance teams managing high-volume bank data. It eliminates manual reconciliation by intelligently classifying transactions, detecting anomalies, and generating executive summaries. The system pulls transaction data from Fable Bank, routes it through multiple AI models (OpenAI GPT-4, NVIDIA NIM) for classification and analysis, reconciles accounts, and distributes formatted reports via email. Finance managers and accounting teams benefit from reduced processing time, improved accuracy, and real-time anomaly detection. The workflow handles transaction categorization, reconciliation schema generation, account matching, journal entry creation, and comprehensive reporting‚Äîtransforming hours of manual work into minutes of automated processing with AI-enhanced accuracy.

## Journalization & Anomaly Detection

**What:** Generates journal entries and detects anomalies with NVIDIA NIM analysis.
**Why:** Preserves accounting integrity and flags suspicious activity.

## Reconciliation & Matching

**What:** Builds reconciliation schemas and matches transactions to account records.
**Why:** Automatically ensures accurate matching and surfaces discrepancies.

## Transaction Ingestion & Classification

**What:** Pulls transaction data from the Fable Bank API and classifies it using AI agents.
**Why:** Eliminates manual data collection and sorting through intelligent automation.

## Reporting & Distribution

**What:** Compiles final reports and sends formatted summaries via Gmail.
**Why:** Delivers actionable insights without manual report preparation.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
